TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISymbolBinder

summary.span: Represents a symbol binder for managed code.

span.span: Represents a symbol binder for managed code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > Diese Schnittstelle ist, der die verwaltete Entsprechung der `ISymUnmanagedBinder` -Schnittstelle, die eines der nicht verwalteten Diagnosesymbolspeicher-Schnittstellen ist, bieten eine alternative MÃ¶glichkeit zum Lesen und Schreiben von Debugsymbolinformationen.This interface is the managed counterpart of the `ISymUnmanagedBinder` interface, which is one of the unmanaged symbol store interfaces that provide an alternate way to read and write debug symbol information.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolReader GetReader (int importer, string filename, string searchPath);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolReader GetReader(int32 importer, string filename, string searchPath) cil managed
Public Function GetReader (importer As Integer, filename As String, searchPath As String) As ISymbolReader
public: System::Diagnostics::SymbolStore::ISymbolReader ^ GetReader(int importer, System::String ^ filename, System::String ^ searchPath);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This interface is not 64-bit clean. Use ISymbolBinder1 instead")

param.name: filename
param.span: The name of the file for which the reader interface is required.

span.span: The name of the file for which the reader interface is required.

param.name: searchPath
param.span: The search path used to locate the symbol file.

span.span: The search path used to locate the symbol file.

summary.span: Gets the interface of the symbol reader for the current file.

span.span: Gets the interface of the symbol reader for the current file.

returns.span: The interface that reads the debugging symbols.

span.span: The interface that reads the debugging symbols.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wenn eine Metadatenschnittstelle, einen Dateinamen und einen Suchpfad der Methode gibt die Schnittstelle, die die dem Modul zugeordneten Debugsymbole liest.When given a metadata interface, a file name, and a search path, the method returns the interface that reads the debugging symbols associated with the module.
